Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored Hungary to win based on their current form.
Marco Rossi has led Hungary to an unbeaten qualification campaign and several victories over strong opponents.
Turkey have progressed to their third successive European Championships after a strong qualification campaign.
Turkey's Vincenzo Montella will meet fellow Italian coach Marco Rossi on the touchline.
Peter Gulacsi is in contention to make his first appearance for Hungary since September 2022.
Arda Guler, a highly-rated teenager, has been called up to the senior squad and is in contention to earn his fifth international cap.
